类 HadoopOutputFormatBase<K,V,T>

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    直接已知子类:
    HadoopOutputFormat

    @Internal
public abstract class HadoopOutputFormatBase<K,V,T>
extends HadoopOutputFormatCommonBase<T>
implements FinalizeOnMaster
    Base class shared between the Java and Scala API of Flink.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getConfiguration

        public Configuration getConfiguration()

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Configures this output format. Since output formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the output formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated output format.

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 OutputFormat<T>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters.

      • open

        public void open(int taskNumber,
                 int numTasks)
          throws java.io.IOException
        create the temporary output file for hadoop RecordWriter.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 OutputFormat<T>
        参数:
        taskNumber - The number of the parallel instance.
        numTasks - The number of parallel tasks.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        commit the task by moving the output file out from the temporary directory.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 OutputFormat<T>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • finalizeGlobal

        public void finalizeGlobal(int parallelism)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FinalizeOnMaster
        The method is invoked on the master (JobManager) after all (parallel) instances of an OutputFormat finished.
        指定者:
        finalizeGlobal 在接口中 FinalizeOnMaster
        参数:
        parallelism - The parallelism with which the format or functions was run.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - The finalization may throw exceptions, which may cause the job to abort.
